name: Tilerunner
description:
Description :

Go through the 5 levels and try to get the gold medal in each one ! (speed, score and not dying will each give you one star).
You will find upgrades in some of the level to help you overcome the enemies and difficult passages.
Pay attention or you might miss the secret zone hidden in the level !

Commands :

  • To move : Q,D or Left, Right arrows
  • To climb ladders : Z,S or Up, Down arrows
  • To jumb : Space (hold to go higher)
  • To retry : R
